About Experience Projects

My name is Francis and I’m a Frontend Developer specialising in building performant, responsive user interfaces based in Gold Coast, Australia.

I’ve worked with a wide-range of clients, from the arts, non-profit & community organisations, fashion, and businesses ranging in all shapes and sizes. My work currently consists of managing ongoing freelance clients & side projects.

When I’m not coding, I’m either watching videos, hanging out with my wife and son, or planning my next camping trip.

View Full Resume

SkinKandy

Developed and managed the site. I made custom components for their quickview and quickadd functions, integrated several 3rd-party apps, and overall optimized their online retail for enhanced user experience.

Mercha

Led the development of this website. Used native web components and Alpine.js to bring flexibility and reactivity to their product, cart and accounts pages. Set up their product packs (product bundles) all the way to its frontend.

The Coffee Club

Collaborated with the team to deliver the website. Made use of Shopify's metafields to display specialized information regarding their coffees and their menu items.
